title: [K-12] Assessment Design for the Philippine High School Biology II Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology concepts and comprehension of educational assessment methodologies
context.additional_context: Case study on the evaluation of the biology curriculum in Philippine STEM-track high schools, focusing on survey-based data analysis methods

learning_goals: Explain survey design and implementation procedures for educational course evaluation
Systematically classify difficulty levels by content areas in Biology II curriculum
Derive educational course improvement directions based on teacher self-assessment results
Perform statistical analysis of educational evaluation data using SPSS
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
